text: Scott and Roberts Dry Cleaning Plant, Office, and Store is a historic dry cleaning plant, office, and store located at Durham, Durham County, North Carolina. It was built in 1947, and is a one-story, three bay Moderne brick building on a partial concrete basement. It features a projecting center bay, plate-glass storefront windows, and a centered front entrance with original glass-block entrance surround. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2012. ==References== Category:Dry cleaning Category:Industrial buildings and structures on the National Register of Historic Places in North Carolina Category:Moderne architecture in North Carolina Category:Industrial buildings completed in 1947 Category:Buildings and structures in Durham, North Carolina Category:National Register of Historic Places in Durham County, North Carolina
title: Scott and Roberts Dry Cleaning Plant, Office, and Store
